name: eps1.0_hellofriend.mov
summary: In MR. ROBOT, Elliot, a cyber-security engineer by day and vigilante hacker by night, is recruited by a mysterious underground group to destroy the firm he's paid to protect. Elliot must decide how far he'll go to expose the forces he believes are running (and ruining) the world.

name: eps1.1_ones-and-zer0es.mpeg
summary: Tyrell Wellick, now Evil Corp's acting CTO since Elliot helped get Terry Colby arrested, makes Elliot an offer he can (and does) refuse: a position as Evil Corp's head of Cyber Security and a big bank account to match. By saying no, has Elliot made himself a mark for Wellick?

name: eps1.2_d3bug.mkv
summary: After being shoved off the railing in Coney Island by Mr. Robot, Elliot wakes up in a hospital room, badly banged up. Krista, his psychiatrist, is inclined to send him to rehab unless he's willing to be regularly drug tested. Elliot complies, knowing that he can easily change the hospital records for the tests since he hacked their system long ago.

name: eps1.3_da3m0ns.mp4
summary: At fsociety, Elliot lays out his plan to hack Steel Mountain's climate control system and raise the heat high enough to melt all the tapes that record the data. Romero points out the plan's many flaws but when Elliot remembers that they only have a few days left before Evil Corp switches over to their new redundant security protocols based on what Tyrell Wellick told him, they reluctantly agree it's now or never.

name: eps1.4_3xpl0its.wmv
summary: Fsociety attempts to penetrate Steel Mountain, the most secure data facility in America.

name: eps1.5_br4ve-trave1er.asf
summary: Elliot attempts to hack Vera out of jail in order to save someone he cares about; Tyrell's "game" gets crazy; and Angela digs deeper into her mother's death.

name: eps1.6_v1ew-s0urce.flv
summary: Elliott goes missing; Mr. Robot tries to pull fsociety back together; Angela goes head-to-head with an old nemesis.

name: eps1.7_wh1ter0se.m4v
summary: Allsafe is controlled; the Dark Army is ready to meet Elliot; and Tyrell and Joanna's plan goes into effect.

name: eps1.8_m1rr0r1ng.qt
summary: The Evil Corp hack is threatened by a mystery man from Elliot's past.

name: eps1.9_zer0-day.avi
summary: In the Season 1 finale, Mr. Robot and Tyrell are MIA; and a past hack haunts Elliot.

name: eps2.0_unm4sk-pt1.tc
summary: one month later and omfg, five/nine changed the world. elliot in seclusion. darlene takes the lead. fsociety delivers malicious payload. TANGO DOWN? tbc.

name: eps2.0_unm4sk-pt2.tc
summary: angela happy at evil corp. tyrell MIA and joanna has a new bf? wtf? dom leads fbi investigation into five/nine. elliot demands answers from mr. robot.

name: eps2.1_k3rnel-pan1c.ksd
summary: Elliot vows to beat Mr. Robot but it ain't easy, smh. Angela sees behind the scenes at Evil Corp. Sh*t hits fan with fsociety.

name: eps2.2_init1.asec
summary: Elliot friends Ray, who he hopes can help delete Mr. Robot; Dom makes a major discovery; and Darlene questions whether the FBI or Dark Army is the bigger threat.

name: eps2.3_logic-b0mb.hc
summary: Elliot can't quit the game; Dom and the FBI head to China to investigate 5/9; Joanna is haunted; and Darlene calls on Angela for help.

name: eps2.4_m4ster-s1ave.aes
summary: Mr. Robot tries to show Elliot that he can be useful; and Darlene and Angela's plan doesn't go as hoped.

name: eps2.5_h4ndshake.sme
summary: Mr. Robot and Elliot try to make nice; and Joanna is given an ultimatum.

name: eps2.6_succ3ss0r.p12
summary: A video is released by fsociety; Darlene decides to act on an old desire.

name: eps2.7_init5.fve
summary: Angela wants more from E Corp than they want to give; and Elliot and Darlene seek answers.

name: eps2.8_h1dden-pr0cess.axx
summary: Elliot wonders if Mr. Robot has been lying to him; Darlene attempts to do the right thing; Dom and the FBI get closer.

name: eps2.9_pyth0n-pt1.p7z
summary: Angela makes an unexpected acquaintance. Elliot does the same. Dom engages in an interesting ama.

name: eps2.9_pyth0n-pt2.p7z
summary: Darlene realizes she is in too deep; an old friend reveals everything to Elliot.

name: eps3.0_power-saver-mode.h
summary: Elliot realizes his mission, and needs help from Angela; Darlene worries about them coming out clean.

name: eps3.1_undo.gz
summary: Elliot becomes encouraged trying to undo five/nine; Darlene gets stuck between a rock and a hard place; Mr. Robot sparks a panic.

name: eps3.2_legacy.so
summary: The former interim CTO of E Corp returns.

name: eps3.3_metadata.par2
summary: Dom has a close call; Elliot chases himself with Darlene on the lookout.

name: eps3.4_runtime-err0r.r00
summary: E Corp is in chaos; Elliot is on the run; Darlene tries to help.

name: eps3.5_kill-pr0cess.inc
summary: Elliot faces off with Mr. Robot; Dom gets tired of the red tape; Tyrell has a new plan.

name: eps3.6_fredrick+tanya.chk
summary: Mr. Robot wants answers; the FBI closes in; Angela hits the rewind button.

name: eps3.7_dont-delete-me.ko
summary: Elliot tries to get ghosted; it is the day of all days.

name: eps3.8_stage3.torrent
summary: Elliot trolls a former ally; Mr. Robot leaves cryptic text; Tyrell gets new commands.

name: shutdown -r
summary: Elliot tries to save Darlene but things don't go as planned. Mr. Robot must decide whether to step up or step back. Angela considers the price.
